Key Match Events: Paolo Banchero scored 15 points in the fourth quarter to nearly drag his hobbled team to the finish line.
Banchero missed a potential game-tying 3-pointer at the final buzzer.
Pre-Game Insights: The Orlando Magic were missing key players Franz Wagner, Mo Wagner, Gary Harris, and Jalen Suggs.
Post-Match Reflections: Bucks coach Doc Rivers praised Paolo Banchero, saying he was 'great' and that his performance was 'unbelievable'.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orlando Magic have a 19-15 record without Paolo Banchero and a 22-18 record with him.
The Magic are sitting fifth in the Eastern Conference.
Others: Franz Wagner has not been cleared for contact, and Mo Wagner is out for the season following ACL surgery.
